data.description: How do you spell Opportunity?!! This home, that's how. This is an investor's special. Needs a lot of cosmetic rehab, but comes with a major payoff once complete, with 4 beds plus bonus room/5th bedroom, 3 full baths and a two car garage at under $300k in this area. Roof and hot water heater are only a few years old, so you can focus on the cosmetic renovations that bring the WOW factor and the higher ROI. Nice LPV flooring has been installed through much of the main level recently. 10 Mins to I-20, close to schools and shopping. If you're an investor, you will don't want to miss this deal!
